Diverting Taunt.name: Diverting Taunt
Diverting Taunt.fullText:
Silver-Tongued Scoundrel Attack 11Diverting Taunt

Your bewildering and enraging taunts distract your target from far more devastating attacks to come.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Effect: The target grants combat advantage for this attack.

Attack: Highest ability vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + highest ability modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 386, page(s) 18.
Diverting Taunt.flavor: Your bewildering and enraging taunts distract your target from far more devastating attacks to come.
Diverting Taunt.effect: The target grants combat advantage for this attack.
Diverting Taunt.onHit: 2[W] + highest ability modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage and cannot make opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn.

Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.name: Silver Tongue, Silver Blade
Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.fullText:
Silver-Tongued Scoundrel Attack 20Silver Tongue, Silver Blade

Through a combination of careful strikes and witty barbs, you keep your enemy reeling.

Daily        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Highest ability vs. Reflex

Hit: 3[W] + highest ability modifier damage. In addition, you can choose one: the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls or grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you hit the target with an attack, you can choose one: the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls or grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 386, page(s) 18.
Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.flavor: Through a combination of careful strikes and witty barbs, you keep your enemy reeling.
Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.onHit: 3[W] + highest ability modifier damage. In addition, you can choose one: the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls or grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Silver Tongue, Silver Blade.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you hit the target with an attack, you can choose one: the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls or grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Master Negotiator.name: Master Negotiator
Master Negotiator.fullText:
Silver-Tongued Scoundrel Utility 12Master Negotiator

Through careful study of body language, intonations, and other subtle clues, you can tailor your own efforts to your adversary.

Daily        Martial
Standard Action      Personal

Effect: Choose Bluff or Diplomacy. Once per round until the end of the encounter, you can roll twice when rolling that skill and choose the higher of the two rolls.


Published in Dragon Magazine 386, page(s) 18.
Master Negotiator.flavor: Through careful study of body language, intonations, and other subtle clues, you can tailor your own efforts to your adversary.
Master Negotiator.effect: Choose Bluff or Diplomacy. Once per round until the end of the encounter, you can roll twice when rolling that skill and choose the higher of the two rolls.
